channel.title: Still need help on Lag
channel.description: everytime i log into a server the game starts lagging really bad and it takes like 2minutes for my character to move or do anything else and i also have the latest version of java and mopar so can somebody tell me how to fix it please....ive tried deleting my web catche and some other files and i rebooted my computer but it still does it

item.title: Still need help on Lag
item.dc:creator: @Khasck Khasck
item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

if its your own server, its your computer, or its your server.
some servers have a overflow of speaking npcs or action npcs.
this means that you might have 1000 npcs fighting eachother while speaking, lagging your server up.
i would either get a new source, or find the problem.
if its not that, i would get antilag
also, if your trying to make a server, i advise fr33sc4p3 pkz as a great server to start on.
hope this helps you,

-Will

Read full topic

item.title: Still need help on Lag
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Its your computer…

or

The hosts computer.

Read full topic
